post.body: oh, well then *pops collar*
merry christmas to you and MAMA!!
you do??? it's me!
merry christmas mom and dad!!!
Congratulations, you were fucking brilliant on Conan and always I've seen you, blessings to you both!!
does that mean we have to find Christ and pump him up to full mass?
Patton Oswalt does an INCREDIBLE seven minutes on that song, which appears to not be online anywhere, but is worth your time!
yes he should. peanut butter ones.
a little from Column A, a little from Column B...
is it sad that im excited for tomorrow so i can open my in-game gifts in WoW?
it didn't come in burrito form, just to clarify
made some pies and a mushroom garam masala "quiche" and now i am eatin a burrito. got my first xmas gift: menses! hooray!
getting ready to go get groceries at the st lawrence market metro. maybe a tree and a box of cards too, left things a lil' late this year
